Careers

Careers at Aganitha

Who are we?

We are a team of IIT alumni with published papers, books and patents. We have worked together for many years building both successful startups and scaling teams at large enterprises. We have managed over ten thousand employees, scaled and delivered billion dollar plus of annual revenue while working with the Fortune 500 companies.

We are a company and a team that combines modern technologies with enterprise IT best practices to help biotechnology companies in the entire drug life cycle

Why Aganitha?

  • A challenging and stimulating environment and an opportunity to work on some of the cutting edge technologies while making significant contributions to the field of biopharma
  • Complete ownership of the problem to help understand the big picture and prepare for bigger roles
  • Emphasis on learning on the job with frequent knowledge sharing sessions
  • A chance for our members to learn basics of all technologies and specialize in a few.
  • We understand how to support employees and help them grow. We place a lot of emphasis on training and nurturing our employees.
  • A chance to work with colleagues from top institutions like IITs and IIITs.

What are we looking for?

We understand that the combination of skills that we look for is not commonly available, and we are comfortable investing in helping our team members build those skills. The founding team and the management team understands the value of investing in our employees and are comfortable with on the job learning and growing to be superstars. We look for the following traits:

  • Ability and curiosity to learn new topics- In the ever evolving world of biopharma and disruptive technology we expect you to proactively keep abreast of new developments in the relevant fields.
  • Ability to communicate well- All our work is fast moving and built collaboratively requiring clear and constant communication
  • Quality Conscious- Conscious approach towards quality output and development of systems that are easy to use and understand for other colleagues and end users
  • Ability to deliver and close- Approach to bring clarity and proper planning to meet the deadlines is a highly appreciated quality

Our Values

Innovation, Research

We embrace the joy of tackling new challenges in multiple disciplines to bring innovative and transformative solutions

Excellence

Producing world class quality pursuing the highest standards across the board

Ownership

Ownership culture encouraging professional growth through mentoring; tolerating failure while learning and taking risks

Inclusiveness

An inclusive, empowering environment open to diverse perspectives

Transparency

Transparency as a foundation of trusted partnership

Partnership approach

Listening to customers and taking initiative to also address latent needs; not just being order takers.

Chanukya Nanduri

Tech Project Manager and Solutions Specialist

What I like at Aganitha:

  • Techno-Scientific: Biology + Chemistry + AI
  • Capable Millenials + Seasoned professionals
  • Meaningful + transformational solutions

"What attracted me and continues to excite me is the way we combine concepts in Computer Science, AI, Biology, and Chemistry to solve tough problems in the biopharma industry. The strong guidance and hands-on collaboration by the seasoned professionals working along with the young millennials to build the solutions helps all of us in our professional growth tremendously."

Abhishek Shakya

Data Scientist

What I like at Aganitha:

  • Deep focus in a domain – Biopharma + AI
  • Academia + research oriented environment
  • Culture of leadership team being hands-on + passionate

“I always wanted an environment that had a strong research orientation with deeper focus in a domain instead of providing generic IT solutions & services. I got this at Aganitha. It is exciting to see how we are solving some complex problems in the biopharma domain with Computer Science fundamentals and AI. The culture at Aganitha of being passionate and the focus on quality inspires me to be my best.”

Siva Kanishka

Data Scientist

What I like at Aganitha:

  • Holistic solutions across the biopharma value chain
  • Real-world impact that my work can create
  • Clear definition of goals and making employees appreciate how their work fits in the big picture

“I always believed that the culture of a company is not formed by defining a set of values and practices, but that it naturally evolves when employees understand and appreciate that their time & energy is worth investing in those two or three things that the company is targeting/doing. This is very evident and that’s what excites me to be part of the Aganitha team.”
